sentences.english: The Senior Technician exam is composed of 100 multiple-choice questions.
sentences.chinese: 高級技師考試由100道選擇題組成。

sentences.english: Experts of foot massage are ready to serve you with 1st class teachnique.
sentences.chinese: 聘請專業沐足技師爲您提供一流的服務。

sentences.english: Chinese technicians closely watched the computer screens monitoring each step in the production processes.
sentences.chinese: 中國的技師正看着電腦屏幕檢測着每一個生產細節。

sentences.english: The degree provides the academic and practical experience to practise as a radiographer.
sentences.chinese: 該學位提供技師的學術及實務執業經驗。

sentences.english: And get experienced technicians to regularly check and maintain your electrical appliances.
sentences.chinese: 還要定期安排有經驗的技師維修和保養電器。

sentences.english: This brilliant engineer and droid technician operated out of the Minos Cluster.
sentences.chinese: 這位才華橫溢的機器人工程技師在米諾斯星團外工作。

sentences.english: We took a shine to our new pusher the first day.
sentences.chinese: 我們從第一天起，就喜歡我們的新技師。

sentences.english: He was a superb technician, but he had a problem taking orders.
sentences.chinese: 他是個很棒的技師，就是有個盲目服從命令的缺點。

sentences.english: One batch devote for the precision machinery offer senior expert, senior technician.
sentences.chinese: 有一批致力爲精密機械奉獻的老專家，老技師。

sentences.english: Officers, engineers and warrant officer engineers wore white overalls.
sentences.chinese: 軍官，技師和二級准尉機師穿產白色工裝褲。

sentences.english: For Our golf club factory , we have the technicians of a twenty-year experiences in making club heads .
sentences.chinese: 高爾夫球具廠擁有二十年經驗的球頭生產技師。

sentences.english: She works as a masseuse at the bathing center.
sentences.chinese: 她在那家浴場中心做按摩技師。

sentences.english: Veterinary technologists and technicians serve as nurses to pooches and felines.
sentences.chinese: 動物技師和獸醫的服務有點像護理貓狗的護士。

sentences.english: Boilermaker course sequences prepare individuals to use technical comprehension and ability to fabricate and repair steam boiler components.
sentences.chinese: 鍋爐技師專業培養學生學習蒸汽鍋爐部件製造和修理。

sentences.english: The 'Supervisor' must be a suitably qualified special effects operator licensed or recognized by ESELA.
sentences.chinese: 必須是一位合資格及經發牌監督認可的特別效果技師。

sentences.english: The technician's console was also swabbed as a positive control.
sentences.chinese: 技師操作的懸臂同樣進行拭子取樣作爲陽性對照組。

definition: to hold an office or post
to hold a governmental office or post/to assume office of/to take charge of/to serve as
in one's spare time/outside working hours/amateur (historian etc)
